T02D3194:203a-5: dang po snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil na gnas pa'i
T02D3194:203a-6: t'am gi sa bon las rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od
T02D3194:203a-7: zer las grub pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang
T02D3194:203a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D3194:203a-9: de dag phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi mchod
T02D3194:203a-10: pas kyang legs par mchod cing de dag gi spyan
T02D3194:203a-11: sngar bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun
T02D3194:203a-12: yang bya ba'o // de nas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3194:203a-13: aom chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pas rang
T02D3194:203a-14: bzhin gyis dag pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o
T02D3194:203a-15: // de nas zla ba dang t'om las yang dag
T02D3194:203a-16: par byung ba'i autpala dkar po la gnas pa'i yi
T02D3194:203a-17: ge t'om las nges par sgrol ma sngon po ste
T02D3194:203a-18: // / phyag gnyis kyi g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa
T02D3194:203a-19: g-yon pas rtsa ba dang bcas pa'i autpala'i mchog sbyin
T02D3194:203a-20: // / bsnams pa / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
T02D3194:203a-21: pa zla ba'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
T02D3194:203a-23: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa ni thal mo
T02D3194:203a-24: sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis rgya
T02D3194:203a-25: ba nas bkab cing mthe bong dag padma 'byar ba
T02D3194:203a-26: ltar nang du brkyang ba ni autpala kha bye ba'i
T02D3194:203a-27: phyag rgya'o // de nas aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3194:203a-28: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3194:203a-29: sgrol ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
